This is the official Mastodon account for Democrats Abroad, the Democratic Party arm for the millions of Americans living outside the US. We strive to provide Americans abroad with a Democratic voice in our government and to elect Democratic candidates by mobilizing the overseas vote.

If you're a US citizen who lives abroad, YOU CAN VOTE in the upcoming #2024Election.

To register, or get overseas voting information for your state, go to http://VoteFromAbroad.org.

We post daily.

Good Afternoon everyone,

DEPHER stood for!
"Disabled and Elderly Plumbing and Heating Emergency Repair" - as we are now branching the company to more of a open plumbing service that helps more than the disabled and elderly we thought this was much needed as we received phonecalls and emails asking do we help this person or can we help this other person we want the company to stand for everybody that needs us, hence the new name

" Community Plumbing &Heating "

fields.name: Customers with disabilities.
fields.value: Low income and single parent families.

fields.name: Or the replacement of plumbing and heating appliances.
fields.value: Help towards the cost of repairs

fields.name: Low income = To remove debt and poverty and reduce the effects on anxiety, depression and families
fields.value: Terms and conditions apply

fields.name: To give independence to those in their own homes
fields.value: Elderly = remove the danger of home health dangers

Allotment life.... Largely images and information about our successes and failures from our allotments in the centre of England. Mostly no dig, mostly raised beds apart from the fruit and potatoes which are in tubs. We keep chickens too and even though we have been doing this for a number of years we learn something new every week. It can be hard and exhausting but at the same time it can be rewarding and fascinating. We love it…

Survivor of Acute Lymphoblastic Leukaemia PH+ve, Stem cell transplant from an amazing German donor in 2016, Tongue cancer 2018, then Acute Myeloid Leukaemia in 2019. Tongue cancer recurred as a liver metastasis in 2020 followed by anal cancer in 2021 and 2022. Yes I know terribly unlucky! But also incredibly lucky to still be here 🙂. European IT consultant. Wife & Westie lover #GTTO #ProEU #FBPE #SaveOurNHS #CEV #CovidIsNotOver #WearAMask 🦆🕷️🇪🇺🇫🇷🇩🇪🇦🇬😷
